cbml:panel.cbml:caption: A STORY HAS TO START SOMEWHERE, SO LET'S BEGIN WITH A LONELY WAREHOUSE, IN THE DEAD OF NIGHT, WHERE WE FIND A ROBBERY TAKING PLACE..
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hold it, you guys! I think I heard somethin'!
Relax, Charlie! It was probably just a mouse!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: SUDDENLY, THE MOST AWESOME IMAGE IN CRIME-FIGHTING APPEARS ON THE WALL DIRECTLY ABOVE THE STARTLED THIEVES...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Mouse? You've never seen a mouse like this before!
L-Look! It.. It's..
Don't be shy, fella! You can say my name! It's Spider-Man!
Get ’im! There are three of us! He can't take us all!
BROTHER, YOU'RE LIVING IN A FOOL'S PARADISE!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: MINUTES LATER...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Some big criminal mastermind you are!
Aw, shaddup! Whoever expectedSpider-Man to but in!
Look, Joe! Spider-Man's been here! And how! are!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: AND NOT FAR AWAY...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: It’s almost too easy! I've run out of enemies who can give me any real opposition! I’m too powerful for any foe! I almost wish for an opponent who’d give me a run for my money!

div.note: Three criminals are stealing a safe, but suddenly Spider-Man shows up to defeat them. He straps the three criminals up using his webs for the police to find.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: AND LITTLE DOES SPIDER-MAN SUSPECT THAT HIS FRIVOLOUS WISH IS ABOUT TO COME TRUE! FOR, AT THAT MOMENT, ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF TOWN...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Here comes Doctor Octopus!
Doctor Octopus? Why do they call him that?
Watch! You'll see in a minute!
See? It's that especially-designed contraption he wears, which enables him to perform his experiments behind the lead walls which shiled him from radiation!!
He created that get-up himself, and he's the only scientist permitted to wear it!
He's the most brillian atomic-researcher in our country today!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: YES, SUCH A MAN IS OTTO OCTAVIOUS, BETTER KNOWN TO HIS CO-WORKERS AS DOCTOR OCTOPUS! LET US WATCH AS HE CONDUCTS A NUCLEAR EXPERIMENT...

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: My artificial extra arms permit me to work safely with volatile chemicals which are far too dangerous to touch without protection!
Though others fear radiation, I alone am able to make it my servant!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: BUT NOTHING IS EVER PERFECT, NOT EVEN THE PROJECTS OF DOCTOR OCTOPUS! AND, AS THE UNSUSPECTING ATOMIC GENIUS CONDUCTS HIS EXPERIMENT…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Look! The radiation-meter has gone wacky! Something is wrong! There's gonna be a blow-up!

div.note: Some scientists gather around to watch Doctor Otto Octavious, also known as Doctor Octopus, conduct his experiments using robotic arms.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: BUT THE WARNING, ALAS, IS GIVEN ТОО LATE! AND BEFORE THE ALARM CAN BE SOUNDED…
THEN, AFTER THE FLAMES AND SMOKE HAVE PARTIALLY CLEARED…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Doctor Octopus is still breathing! I hope we've reached him in time!
Even though he's still alive, he's absorbed a great deal of radiation - - poor guy!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: IN THE HOURS THAT FOLLOW, AFTER EXHAUSTIVE TESTS…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The x-rays show an uncertain amount of brain damage! I'm afraid his mind has been permanently damaged!
We can't remove those artificial arms of his yet! The radiation has caused them to adhere to his body in some strange way!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: FINALLY, DAYS LATER, THE INJURED SCIENTIST RECOVERS CONSCIOUSNESS...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: What am I doing here? let me get up! I must return to my work!
No! you've been very ill! you must stay in bed! you need the rest!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: BUT THE BRAIN OF DR. OCTOPUS-- THE BRAIN WHICH HAS BEEN DAMAGED BY RADIATION-- REACTS IN A BITTER WAY…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: They're jealous of me! They want to keep me from my work! But I'll show them! I'm stronger than any of them!
The window is barred! They're trying to make a prisoner of me! The fools! No one can hold Doctor Octopus against his will! No one!

div.note: An explosion occurs! Doctor Octopus is caught in the blast and has absorbed radiation and wakes up in the hospital with the arms of his contraption adhered to his torso.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: THEN SUDDENLY, AT JUST A SUGGESTION OF A THOUGHT BY DR. OCTOPUS, HIS ARTIFICIAL ARMS MOVE AS THOUGH THEY HAVE A WILL OF THEIR OWN...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I’ve got to break those bars!
I did it!! My arms did it! Their strength is incalculable! They can do anything!
Somehow, my mechanical arms have almost become a part of me! They obey my every command with such power! And with my brilliant mind, I'm the supreme human being on Earth.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: MINUTES LATER...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You wanted to see me, Dr. Octopus?
Yes! Come in! Shut the door behind you!
What is it? You-- oh, no! No!
Ha-ha! You don't believe what you see? But it's true! I'm all-powerful! From now on, I give the commands here!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: MEANWHILE, AT THE OFFICE OF J. JONAH JAMESON, PUBLISHER OF THE DAILY BUGLE...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I want pictueres of the injured head scientist, Dr. Octopus, but no one is allowed to enter the hospital anymore!
I never heard of any hospital keeping people out! Don't worry, J.J. I'll get those pix for you!
My best men have tried and failed! But so far you've succeeded in every assignment! I can't imagine how a teen-ager like you does it!
Our agreement, J.J., is that you're never to ask me how I do it!
Just have a check ready for me when I bring back the pix of Dr. Octopus!
He doesn't suspect Peter Parker, the teenager he assigned to the job, is going to have Spider-Man do it!

div.note: Doctor Octopus uses his mind to control his artificial arms and break the bars on his window. Meanwhile, Jameson asks Peter Parker to get into the hospital to get pictures of Doctor Octopus.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: AND SO...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Here's the place! Strange that it's locked and nobody is admitted! What kind of hospital is it, anyway?
Well, there's one way to find out... Spider-Man’s just the cat to do it!
These suction fingers of mine will get me up the wall in time! Boy, it's great being Spider-Man! I can do almost anything!
The only problem is - - my jobs are too easy! I welcome a little competition once in a while!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: AND, AS HE STEADILY CLIMBS UP THE SHEER OUTER WALL, LITTLE DOES SPIDER-MAN DREAM THAT HE IS SOON TO GET FAR MORE "COMPETITION" THAN HE EVER BARGAINED FOR!
SECONDS LATER...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Almost there!
Holy mackerel! What's that?
Silence! Nobody is to speak when Dr. Octopus speaks!

div.note: Spider-Man scales the walls to get into the hospital, and he gets his first glimpse of Doctor Octopus through the corner of a window.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: PEERING UNSEEN THROUGH THE LARGE PICTURE WINDOW, SPIDER-MAN WITNESSES A STRANGE, UNEXPECTED SIGHT...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You can’t keep all of us prisoners forever , Doctor Octopus! We've done what you asked—gotten you all the equipment you wanted! When will you let us go?
Not until I'm ready! With my powers, no one can resist me! You'll remain to serve me until I no longer need you—and not before!
Well, well! So the good doc has flipped his lid, eh? Well, this is just what I’ve been hopin' for—a little action!
But this is mad! You have no right—
Right?! You dare speak to me of right?
I have the rightto do anything—as long as I have the power! And if you doubt my power, here is a small sample...
No! Don’t! Let me down!
Looks like it’s time for Spider-Man to join the party before he really hurts that fella!
Hold it, doc! How about picking on someone who can fight you back?
Well, I sure ain’t Albert Schweitzer!
You dare speak flippantly to me! You fool! When I'm finished with you, you’ll sing a different tune!

div.note: Spider-Man sees that Doctor Octopus is holding people prisoner and decides to jump into action. He swings in, breaking through the window and confronting Doctor Octopus.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You don’t think those dumb-looking flappers of yours can move fast enough to catch spider-man do you?
Surprised? Doctor Octopus is far more powerful than you dreamed! far more powerful than even you!
Don’t let that one lucky punch go to your head, pal! I’ve a few more surprises!
Ah! Most ingenious of you! Your spider’s web!!
But, as you can see, holding only two of my arms isn’t enough! I still have more!
No time to shoot my web again! He’s faster than I expected!
But I can still grab his other arms!
Oof! It takes all my strength! He--he also has super-human strength!
My web! He snapped it! Nobody has ever done that before!
And now, Spider-man, I grow bored with this game! My time is too valuable!

div.note: Spider-Man leaps at Doctor Octopus, however, the mechanical arms quickly overwhelm Spider-Man.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Now, watch me trap a spider in a web of my own--a web made of my new-found arms! Your strength is merely that of a spider, but mine is the energy of an atom, born of a nuclear accident!
I’m helpless! Can’t fight all those arms at once! Don’t know what to do next! He’s just toying with me!
You dared to mock me before! Why aren’t you mocking me now? where are your brave words and taunts now, Spider-man?
Or do you realize you’ve finally met your master? And now, you can leave the way you entered! You’re no threat to me!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: WEAK, GROGGY, JUST BARELY CONSCIOUS, SPIDER-MAN HAS HIS FALL BROKEN BY A TREE, AS HE FINALLY SLUMPS TO THE GROUND... IN DEFEAT!

div.note: Spider-Man in caught in Doctor Octopus' arms! Declaring himself the victor, Doc Ock tosses Spider-Man out the window.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: He beat me! I--I never had a chance!
I didn’t even give him a good fight! He could’ve finished me off any time he wanted to!
What do I do now? I've never been beaten before! But this time, my spider powers were not enough! Is this the end of Spider-Man?

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: NOT LONG AFTERWARDS, AT THE HOSPITAL...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Even though I defeated Spider-Man, my prisoners escaped during the fight! I must leave, before the police arrive!
With my arms, I can go anywhere... Do anything! Fences can’t stop me! No one can catch me!
Now that I have reached my objective, any unlocked window will furnish an entrance for me!
The security police aren’t apt to notice an extra pipe or two up on the ceiling! Once he’s gone, I can act freely!

div.note: Spider-Man takes off his mask to catch his breath, a worried expression on his face. Meanwhile, Doctor Octopus finds somewhere to hide. He uses his mechanical arms to get through an unlocked window and crawl on the ceiling to avoid security.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: This is what I’m after! The brain center of the entire atomic lab! Once I take it over, the greatest source of atomic power in the nation will be mine!
It’s an easy matter for Doctor Octopus to unlock a door!
Out! All of you!… I’m taking over now!
D-Did you see that? It was Doctor Octopus!
But what’s he up to?
Nothing can stop me now! Between my own super-strength and the atomic power which is mine to command here, I’m the strongest man alive!
But first, I’ll give the world a demonstration of my strength! I’ll destroy part of this plant and rebuild it to suit myself!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: And so…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Something’s happened to the lead shielding! It’s been lowered! The radiation is starting to escape!
Look! The giant machines are running out of control--as though some madman is guiding them!
There’s too much pressure in the main valves! The pipes are overheating… exploding! It isn’t safe to stay here!

div.note: Doctor Octopus takes over an atomic lab, throwing everyone else out of the control room. He quickly gets to work, using all of his mechanical arms to man the control panel.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But, within minutes, the source of the trouble is made known, and...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: We’ve got to reach Doctor Octopus somehow!
We can’t! He’s set up electronic barriers all over the place!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: And, before long, the entire plant is evacuated, except for...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: They realize I cannot be stopped and have given up trying! I’ve won!! The plant is mine! I am now in complete control!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: The foremost brains of the nation’s armed forces and security agencies confer feverishly, but to no avail...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: We’ve never been up against anything like this before! A brilliant scientist, with super-human powers, on a mad rampage!
If we can’t stop him, then we must see that innocent people are not injured!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: And so, the order goes out—no one is allowed in or out of the atomic plant...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Can’t figure out why they post sentries here! If Dr. Octopus tries to get out, how can we stop him?

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Meanwhile, what of teen-age Peter Parker, alias Spider-Man?
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Poor Peter’s been moping in his room for hours! I wish he’d tell me what’s wrong!
I’m a failure! Spider-Man is a joke... a nothing. There's the phone!
Mr. Jameson? No, I won’t be able to get the pictures of Doctor Octopus! No, I probably won’t be able to get any more! Sorry... yeah... good bye.
Peter, dear, what’s wrong? I can’t bear to see you so unhappy! Is there anything I can do to help?
No, Aunt May... it’s... it’s my own personal problem! I’ll get over it! Got to leave now... time for school!

div.note: Doctor Octopus smiles maliciously, enjoying having control of the plant. The nation’s armed forces surround the plant. Meanwhile, Peter Parker mopes in his room, feeling defeated. He answers the phone and then leaves his house shortly after.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hello, Petey!... Say, what's wrong with him? He didn't answer!
And there's no one I can talk to... No one who'd understand!
Him? He's down in the dumps! Looks like he lost his favorite test tube!
Pete, did you hear the big news? The governer's asked the Fantastic Four to try to capture Doctor Octopus!
They're busy with another case, but they sent the Human Torch to see what he can do! He's speaking at our assembly today!
Big deal!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Later, at the school assembly...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I was asked here to tackle Doctor Octopus. But I've used my flame so much recently, I have to wait a few days to let it get strong again! While I'm waiting, your principal asked me to address you...
If only I had his power... his confidence!... But that's wasy when you've never been beaten!
Now for a little demonstration! I can't apply my total flame, but here are some fiery figures for you!
This is what usually happens when The Thing helps me with my homework! I get results like this!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Then, after a few more colorful demonstrations...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Now, for a parting thought! Stick to your school work and do your best in your studies! Don't be discouraged if it sometimes seems tough! The important thing is never give up! Remember that-- never give up!
Ability alone isn't enough! It's one lesson I've learned from my partnership with the Fantastic Four!
It's almost as though he's talking to me!
Even the Fantastic Four have had defeats-- but we always come back! Our motto is never say die!
He's right! By golly, he's right!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: LATER, AT THE CONCLUSION OF THE TORCH’S LECTURE...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I want to thank you for that speech! I—I’ll never forget what you said today! It meant a lot to me!
Huh? Oh, Sure-- sure! Glad you enjoyed it, fella!

div.note: A miserable Peter Parker arrives at school and then sits in an assembly. As he listens to the speech, he realizes that he can’t give up. His face changes from one of defeat to one of determination.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: LIKE A MAN POSSESSED PETER PARKER RACES HOME TO THE PRIVACY OF HIS ROOM, AND...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I guess if the Fantastic Four could be defeated, and then go back for more, Spider-Man can too!
Okay, Doctor Octopus! This is it!! Now that I know how strong you are, you won't have the advantage of surprise on your side again!
This is one easy way to get past those sentries below!
Hey! Did you just see someone flying above us?
Someone flying above us? Are you some kinda nut or somethin'?
So far, so good! I landed safely on the roof without being stopped!
Now, to get as close as I can to Doctor Octopus before he discovers me!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: BUT THE STRANGE SCIENTIST HAS EYES EVERYWHERE, AND...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: It's Spider-Man again! Well, this time he won't be so lucky! This time I'll finish him for good!

div.note: Peter Parker races home and puts on his Spider-Man suit. Spider-Man then hurries to the plant, using his webs to sling himself over the fence and past the guards. Alas, Doctor Octopus sees him through the security monitors inside.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: From now on, I allow no one to interfere with my plans! I will permit no one to defy me!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: AND, AT THAT MOMENT...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: My spider senses warn me of danger behind me!
Nice try, Doctor Octopus, but I'm ready for you this time!
With my spider senses fully alert, and my spider muscles in top condition, he can't possibly hurl those electronic bolts fast enough to hurt me!
He knows my every move! He must be watching me on some sort of TV hookup! Well, I'll just go somewhere out of range... as only I can!
He's found a way to evade my electronic scanners! Hmm... he's cleverer than I thought!

div.note: Doctor Octopus, watching Spider-Man on camera, tries to defeat Spider-Man by crushing him with machinery. Spider-Man leaps out of the way just in time. Realizing he’s on camera, Spider-Man and decides to crawl on the ceiling where he can’t be seen.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: But I’ll defeat him with my all-powerful arms, as I did before! He won’t elude me now!
Ah, there’s what I’m looking for—the chemlab!
I’ve got to move fast! It won’t be long before he finds me!
There!! It’s done!
And now this wiring’ll suit my purpose just fine!
Mustn’t make a mistake! Doctor Octopus won’t give me a second chance if anything goes wrong.

div.note: An overly confident Doctor Octopus looms in the doorway, awaiting Spider-Man. Spider-Man, meanwhile, finds a chemistry lab and cooks up a device. He mixes several chemicals together and ties them together using a length of rope.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I still can't be sure this will work, but I've GOT to try it!
Now to find DOCTOR OCTOPUS!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: ONCE AGAIN, AT THE LAST SPLIT-SECOND, SPIDER-MAN'S SPIDER INSTINCT SAVES HIM FROM SUDDEN DEFEAT...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hah!I've got you, SPIDER-MAN! Wha--?
Oh, NO, you don't!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: MOVING WITH EVERY OUNCE OF SPEED HE POSSESSES, SPIDER-MAN MANAGES TO LOOP ONE OF HIS HASTILY CONSTRUCTED DEVICES AROUND TWO OF DOCTOR OCTOPUS' ARMS BEFORE ANOTHER ARM, STRIKING OUT, FORCES HIM TO DROP THE SECOND DEVICE...
BUT SPIDER-MAN HAS SUPER-HUMAN STRENGTH, EVEN AS DOCTOR OCTOPUS, AND HE RECOVERS FROM THE BLOW IN SECONDS, IN TIME TO DIVE OUT OF HARM'S WAY...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Now to get out of reach and watch what happens!
You hope to defeat me with a foolish thing like THIS? You must be MAD!
Oh, I see! It's a chemical which fuses my metal arms together! Hmm... clever!
But I can take care of that easily -- after I dispose of you for good!

div.note: With a coil of rope in each hand, Spider-Man goes in search of Doctor Octopus and narrowly avoids a sneak attack from behind. Spider-Man is able to get one of his devices around two of Doctor Octopus’ arms, which fused them together. Spider-Man leaps away from another attack from the remaining two arms.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: S LOWLY, INEXORABLY, DR. OCTOPUS FORCES SPIDER-MAN BACK AGAINST THE WALL, BLOCKING HIS WEB WITH HIS SWIFTLY-MOVING ARMS...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: HA-HA! Even your fast-shooting web isn't quick enough for me!
He's using his fused arms like a club! I can't retreat any further! My back is to the wall! I've got to take a desperate chance!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: MOVING LIKE A PERSON POSSESSED, SPIDER-MAN WHIPS HIS LEGS AROUND ONE OF DOCTOR OCTOPUS' TENTACLE ARMS, WHILE HE SEIZES THE OTHER FREE ARM WITH BOTH OF HIS POWERFUL HANDS...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: But not for long!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: THEN, BEFORE DOCTOR OCTOPUS CAN MAKE ANOTHER MOVE, SPIDER-MAN SHOOTS HIS AMAZING WEB DIRECTLY AT THE STARTLED SCIENTIST'S FACE...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I should have realized sooner, OCTOPUS, the best defense is a smashing offense!
That blasted web! It's spread out over my glasses! I--I can't see! Can't get it off!
Even though he can no longer see me, his other arms are now around me -- pulling me toward him with incredible strength!

div.note: With Doctor Octopus closing in on him, Spider-Man shoots Doctor Octopus in the face with his web. Doctor Octopus is now more focused on removing the webs from his face than fighting Spider-Man.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ah... there!! I got them off!
I’ve got his two free arms apart! But I dare not let go of them!
Give up, fool! Sooner or later you’ll have to let go, and then I’ll have you!
I’ve got one chance... but I’ve got to time it to the split second or I’m finished!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: SUDDENLY, SPIDER-MAN LETS GO OF DOCTOR OCTOPUS’ ARMS AND, AT THE SAME INSTANT, LASHES OUT WITH A SMASHING RIGHT!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I did it! I knocked him out!
I had to let him go, and then strike faster than he could move!
Strange that an old fashioned puch to the jaw defeated the most dangerous villain I've ever faced!
Better not take any chances! I’ll wrap my webbing around him many times while he’s out! He’ll neverbe able to snap this!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: LATER, AT THE SENTRY POST OUTSIDE THE ATOMIC PLANT...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Captain! We’ve been hearing noises inside there! Like a fight!
Someone must have sneaked past us and—look! over there!

div.note: Doctor Octopus removes his glasses, which are covered in webs. However, Spider-Man knocks him unconscious with a punch to his face before he can react. The guards at the sentry post, upon hearing the commotion, run inside.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: It’s the sign of Spider-Man!
There he is! He’s waving to us to come on!
Careful, pal! No telling what’s goin’ on!
You’re tellin’ me! I’m gonna shoot first and ask questions later!
Look! It’s Doctor Octopus! He’s all tied up and helpless!
Don’t just stand there! Get me out of this!
The authorities will be able to handle Doctor Octopus now!
But I still have one more thing to take care of—as Spider-Man!

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: MINUTES LATER, THE DRAMATICALLY COSTUMED SUPER-HERO CLIMBS THE SHEER WALL OF A NEARBY HOLTEL...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: He's somewhere in this holtel! I'll find him easily!
My spider sense tells me that his room is just ahead!

div.note: The guards go inside to find a tied up and helpless Doctor Octopus. Spider-Man has already fled, making his way into the city. He begins to scale hotel.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: AND INSIDE THE ROOM IN QUESTION...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Good news,Torch! Your temperature is down and your virus is gone! By now, your flame should be working at full strength!
Great, Doc! I wanna show my partners in the Fantastic Four that I can tackle Doctor Octopus Alone!
And now for--
Relax,Torch! Doctor Octopus has been captured already!
Thanks to you, Torch, Octopus is safely under wraps! And I owe you additional thanks because, if not for you, Spider-Man might’ve been finished, too!
Huh?
So long,Torch! See ya around, pal!
Flamin’ fireballs! I don’t get it! What did I do??

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: THE NEXT DAY, THE HUMAN TORCH GIVES A PULSE-POUNDING DEMONSTRATION OF HIS FULL POWERS BEFORE RETURNING TO HIS HEADQUARTERS...
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Wish Spider-Man was still around to join me in this show! But I don’t know where he cut out to!
Now there’s my idea of a hero! The Human Torch--and a guy like Spider-Man, too! Why don’tcha watch and see what a real man is like, bookworm?
Someday I’ll tell you why, loud mouth! And I’m sure gonna enjoy it! Yes sir, it’s gonna be a real pleasure!
cbml:panel.cbml:caption: AND, FOR THE FIRST TIME, A CASE ENDS WITHOUT PETER PARKER DELIVERING ANY PHOTOS TO MR. JAMESON! BUT, RIGHT NOW, PETER COULDN’T CARE LESS!

div.note: Spider-Man makes his way to Torch’s hotel room and thanks him. He quickly swings away before Torch can properly react. The next day at school. Torch then gives a demonstration of his full powers as Peter Parker's classmates watch on in amazement.
